structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

text.section: persons eligible for licensure under section 119 who provide consultative services for a fee no more than one day a month; or

students of psychology, psychological interns or persons preparing for the practice of psychology under qualified supervision in a recognized training institution or facility; provided, however, that they are designated by such titles as “psychological intern”, “psychological trainee” or other title clearly indicating such training status.
